name: 1010 Block Puzzle Master
description:
1010 Block Puzzle Master begins with an blank 10*10 grid of squares and three colored, irregularly shaped figures at the bottom of the screen. These figures are an arrangement of blocks the same size as the blank squares in the 10*10 grid. The player must drag these blocks onto the grid, and after the blocks are dropped, they are unable to be moved from where they were placed.

Features 1010 Block Puzzle Master
- styles of blocks bring different puzzle experience
- Day and night mode support
- Integrating Game Service, challenge with players all around the world

How to play 1010 Block Puzzle Master
- Drop blocks to create and destroy full lines on the screen both vertically and horizontally and keep the blocks from filling the screen in this addictive block crush puzzle game
- Fill all the grids with the matching blocks on the 10*10 block board
- No time limitation, no color match!



Enjoy the 1010 Block Puzzle Master - Block Puzzle game, you've got to enjoy the challenge of it!
